subject: Pass this along
body:
Corporate Meds Inc. Policy Change:
 
As of June 1st, 2007, we started accepting orders
from the public.
We still specialize in bulk orders for larger companies, and
now have a public website with our wholesale prices.
 
If you decide to create an account within the month of June,
we will offer discounts on all your orders during this time period and will
offer special promotions in the future.
 
Site Link:
http://corporatemeds.com
 
Have a great day;
 
Corporate Meds Inc.
Lesli Zahn
Marketing Supervisor
